english_example_sentence: You are the ones who stop here every morning on this busy street.
russian_example_sentence: Вы те, кто останавливается здесь каждое утро на этой оживленной улице.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu işlek caddede her sabah duransınız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bu işlek caddede her sabah ______.
